```{=html}
<style>
:root{
  --bg:#ffffff;          /* page background */
  --panel:#ffffff;       /* card top gradient */
  --panel-2:#f9f9f9;     /* card bottom gradient */
  --text:#0b0c0d;        /* main text */
  --muted:#555555;       /* muted text */
  --accent:#c6ff3f;
  --accent-2:#86ff33;
  --stroke:#dddddd;      /* card border */
  --radius:16px;
  --gap:22px;
}

body{
  margin:0;
  background: var(--bg);
  color: var(--text);
  font-family: ui-sans-serif, system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Arial, "Noto Sans";
}

.wrap{max-width:1280px; margin:48px auto; padding:0 20px;}
h2{margin:0 0 14px; font-size:34px; letter-spacing:-.02em}
p.lead{margin:0 0 18px; color:var(--muted)}

.viewport{
  position:relative;
  overflow:hidden;
  border-radius:18px;
}

.rail{
  display:flex; gap:var(--gap);
  overflow-x:auto;
  scroll-snap-type:x mandatory;
  scroll-padding:0;
  padding-bottom:2px;
}
.rail::-webkit-scrollbar{display:none}
.rail{-ms-overflow-style:none; scrollbar-width:none}

.item{
  flex:0 0 calc((100% - (var(--gap) * 3)) / 4);
  scroll-snap-align:start;
}

@media (max-width:1000px){
  .item{flex:0 0 calc((100% - var(--gap)) / 2);}
}
@media (max-width:560px){
  .item{flex:0 0 100%;}
}

.card{
  position:relative; overflow:hidden; cursor:pointer;
  border-radius:var(--radius);
  background:linear-gradient(180deg, var(--panel) 0%, var(--panel-2) 100%);
  border:1px solid var(--stroke);
  transition:transform .25s ease, border-color .25s ease;
  color: var(--text);
}
.card:hover{ transform:translateY(-6px); border-color:#cccccc }
.card::before{
  content:""; position:absolute; inset:-1px;
  background: radial-gradient(120% 60% at 100% 0%, rgba(134,255,51,.10), transparent 45%);
  z-index:0;
}

.card-top{
  position:absolute; inset:12px 12px auto 12px;
  display:flex; gap:8px; z-index:2; align-items:center;
}
.pill{
  font-size:12px; padding:8px 10px; border-radius:999px;
  color:#0b0c0d; background:rgba(0,0,0,.05);
  border:1px solid #cccccc; backdrop-filter: blur(2px);
  line-height:1;
}
.rating{display:flex; align-items:center; gap:6px;
  padding:8px 10px; border-radius:999px;
  background: rgba(198,255,63,.08); color:#0b0c0d;
  border:1px solid rgba(198,255,63,.25); font-size:12px;}
.rating .dot{width:7px;height:7px;border-radius:50%;background:var(--accent);box-shadow:0 0 12px var(--accent)}

.avatar{
  position:relative; z-index:1; width:100%; display:block;
  aspect-ratio:4/5; object-fit:cover; filter: contrast(1.05) saturate(.1);
}
.content{
  position:relative; z-index:2; padding:16px 16px 14px;
  display:flex; align-items:center; justify-content:space-between; gap:10px;
}
.name{display:flex; flex-direction:column}
.name h3{margin:0 0 6px; font-size:18px; letter-spacing:-.01em; color: var(--text);}
.name p{margin:0; color:var(--muted); font-size:13px}

.cta{
  width:38px; height:38px; border-radius:50%;
  display:grid; place-items:center; border:none;
  background:linear-gradient(180deg, var(--accent) 0%, var(--accent-2) 100%);
  color:#0a0c0b; box-shadow:0 8px 20px rgba(134,255,51,.35);
}
.arrow{width:14px;height:14px;border-right:2px solid #0b0c0b;border-bottom:2px solid #0b0c0b;transform:rotate(-45deg);margin-left:-2px}
</style>

<script>
const rail = document.getElementById('rail');
const items = Array.from(rail.querySelectorAll('.item'));
function colsPerView(){if(window.matchMedia('(max-width:560px)').matches) return 1;if(window.matchMedia('(max-width:1000px)').matches) return 2;return 4;}
function pageWidth(){const n=colsPerView();if(!items.length)return 0;const first=items[0];const itemW=first.getBoundingClientRect().width;const gap=parseFloat(getComputedStyle(rail).gap||22);return itemW*n+gap*(n-1);}
function scrollByPage(direction=1){rail.scrollBy({left:pageWidth()*direction,behavior:'smooth'});}
rail.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{const card=e.target.closest('.card');if(!card)return;const viewRect=rail.getBoundingClientRect();const clickX=e.clientX-viewRect.left;const half=viewRect.width/2;if(clickX<half){scrollByPage(-1);}else{scrollByPage(1);}});
window.addEventListener('keydown',(e)=>{if(e.key==='ArrowRight')scrollByPage(1);if(e.key==='ArrowLeft')scrollByPage(-1);});
let resizeTimer;window.addEventListener('resize',()=>{clearTimeout(resizeTimer);resizeTimer=setTimeout(()=>{const pw=pageWidth();if(!pw)return;const current=rail.scrollLeft;const nearest=Math.round(current/pw)*pw;rail.scrollTo({left:nearest,behavior:'instant' in window?'instant':'auto'});},120);});
</script>
```
